headline: Sysco Corporation (SYY) Maintains Buy Rating as Global Growth and Scale Drive Optimism
summary: Sysco Corporation (NYSE:SYY) ranks among the top consumer staples stocks according to hedge funds. On June 9, Jefferies analyst Alexander Slagle maintained his Buy rating on Sysco Corporation (NYSE:SYY) and set a price target of $88 on the company’s shares. The analyst claims that the company’s size and scale, which enable large expenditures in workforce, […]
